snippet.title: Heroic - Magic Duel Cinematic Trailer: LIVE NOW!
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD NOW!
Android: https://norde.us/heroiconandroid
iOS: https://norde.us/heroiconios

Heroic - Magic Duel is now available WORLDWIDE on iOS and Android with 5 Heroes, 8 breathtaking Arenas, 25 unique Spells, and 50 Minions all waiting for you to bring it on! 

Fight your way through epic Arenas in this strategy-driven PvP battle game. Pick your Hero and step into the Arena today.

______________________________________

Join Heroes around the world on Heroic's community channels:

Official Forum: https://community.heroicgame.com/
Discord: https://invite.gg/playheroic 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playheroic/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playheroic/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playheroic
